Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Intro_00:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="ccf05874ef754f1ca1b9c8a8c6d99179" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Ah,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] there you are.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ccf05874ef754f1ca1b9c8a8c6d99179" Scale="1"/]Just so you know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] if you'd ever like to hear
more about my shipwreck experience,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I'd
be happy to share.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_HappySkill_Swallow_I:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="6d048596690441e9a5030d2505bb1958" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Oh, yes. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]There's something I wanted to
tell you.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6d048596690441e9a5030d2505bb1958" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]Given [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s strength,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I believe
he's a prime candidate to learn
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s special technique.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6d048596690441e9a5030d2505bb1958" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]I named it the Swallow.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] Would you like me
to teach you this skill?
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_HappySkill_Swallow_L:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="9a632b06bbf346b18792dd1990667b29" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]So, here's how you use Swallow.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9a632b06bbf346b18792dd1990667b29" Scale="1"/]Simply direct your pup to run toward
whatever it is you want him to carry,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
then he swallows it whole to carry it.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="9a632b06bbf346b18792dd1990667b29" Scale="1"/]It's quite simple.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] But don't worry—if the
Pikmin are already transporting something,
he won't swallow it...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]or them.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_HappySkill_Swallow_O:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="ebbdd0d0a1c64f91ad1bc835e434da67" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Please give it a try sometime.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Alright,
well...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]that's it for now.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_HappySkill_LastSkill:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="5dbc6969e3ad4356b14a82c04a5594a0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hmm.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] When I saw [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] running endlessly
earlier,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I remembered something.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="5dbc6969e3ad4356b14a82c04a5594a0" Scale="1"/]I believe [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] can also run at a brisk
pace without ever tiring.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="e52b95b2fcfc47859e2f379163aa08df" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I will do everything in my power to help
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] recover.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Intro_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="f1cee9facd6949aea6619205f48d0fc6" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]If you're ever curious about something,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
please feel free to ask me about it. [etc:Wait frame="15"/]I would
be honored to assist you in any way I can.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Intro_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="3430d12a339d4b39b32977d5115da1e4" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I'm shocked that [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] came to this
planet too...
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Intro_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="5d95487efbcc41de9c64822b8dde7029" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If you're not busy, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]would you like to hear
about my time stranded here?
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Intro_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="66bba2768e1a419299e376d61fe03768" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Everything will work out.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I'm confident
we'll find a way to cure [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Intro_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="490415e2dc5e43b8af83972b58e1adb8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Oh, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]...[etc:Wait frame="15"/] My goodness,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] what are
you up to?
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Intro_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="654dd7a9aaf44cacbf82cbf1a58fa0c1" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Glad"/]I'm so glad to see [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s recovered.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
We can't forget to thank the Koppaites
for all their help.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Intro_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="dac32a62a3254d92b79b8e70021d769c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hmm...[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You seem to have some time on
your hands.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Would you like to hear my
story?[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Though I should warn you—it's long.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Guide_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="c701866820da465aacb076449eeb6c8d" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If only [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] was just a little stronger,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
he could learn a few of [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s tricks.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Guide_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="e82d9ff400cd4d8aa93029db224d45f7" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]When I was a leafling,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I saw something
that still nags at me.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Perhaps if I search
my memories,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I could piece it together...
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Guide_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="239e7a2f27d941be9e8eef7115d5ac7a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I've had the strangest dreams lately.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="239e7a2f27d941be9e8eef7115d5ac7a" Scale="1"/]There's this white leafling standing in front
of that cave, saying,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] "Come, and become
my apprentice.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] You shall be rewarded..."
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="6a1e12d4eaab44649aa56b8230451543" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I'm not sure why,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but organisms that have
sprouted leaves cannot leave this planet.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
At least, that's what I've observed.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6a1e12d4eaab44649aa56b8230451543" Scale="1"/][Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] already had a leaf on her tail when
we first met.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="6a1e12d4eaab44649aa56b8230451543" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]She may have been that way since birth,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
like the Pikmin.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="a9d5ad2f67ad462e9470a530a092a69e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I never imagined that a meteorite would
hit the ship...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a9d5ad2f67ad462e9470a530a092a69e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]It's a miracle that I'm alive at all.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I want to
thank you again for everything.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="a9d5ad2f67ad462e9470a530a092a69e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Seriously,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] thank you.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_01_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="d6bf0ea9711643aebbc22ea43b52c0e0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]After my life support failed,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my memories
get very fuzzy.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d6bf0ea9711643aebbc22ea43b52c0e0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]All I know is that when I awoke,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my head
was brimming with all things Dandori and
nothing else.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="d6bf0ea9711643aebbc22ea43b52c0e0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I've had more than enough of these types
of experiences by now,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] believe me.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="32b514e5b639400cbe68a3baea1d34f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]Like me, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] works for Hocotate Freight.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="32b514e5b639400cbe68a3baea1d34f3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]If he came to this planet looking for me,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
I don't understand why he'd run away...
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="97a2d63652e3447c9922a3c76c84d783" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I actually have another dog back on my
home planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="97a2d63652e3447c9922a3c76c84d783" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]His name is Bulbie,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and he's probably the
friendliest dog ever.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="97a2d63652e3447c9922a3c76c84d783" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'd like to think he and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] would be
good friends.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_02_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="0f1919dceda048f6aa785a023ad6836e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I feel terrible that I've left the search for
[Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] solely in your hands.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0f1919dceda048f6aa785a023ad6836e" Scale="1"/]I'm an adventurer at heart.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I honestly
wish I could join you in your search.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0f1919dceda048f6aa785a023ad6836e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]But the doctor's orders were quite strict.[etc:Wait frame="15"/]
Rest,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] rest,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and more rest.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="1d03e4a8f32f457d9c5d4eaae6c74c79" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The truth about [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] is that he has a
good heart...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]deep down.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Beneath all those
clumsy and awkward parts.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1d03e4a8f32f457d9c5d4eaae6c74c79" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I'm sure he had his own [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Louie"/]Louie[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]-like reasons
for challenging you to a Dandori Battle.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1d03e4a8f32f457d9c5d4eaae6c74c79" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Do you think you could let it go and
forgive him,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] for me?
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="77c07b5fd2744571859fb74bfe8714e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I have a son and a daughter.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="77c07b5fd2744571859fb74bfe8714e8" Scale="1"/]This was my first break from work in a
long time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and look at how it turned out.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
They must be worried sick about me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="77c07b5fd2744571859fb74bfe8714e8" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I wish I could be with them at this
very minute.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_03_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="88761adb910b43c9b1145797f6714b28" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When I get back home,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was thinking I
may write a book about this experience.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="88761adb910b43c9b1145797f6714b28" Scale="1"/]I haven't settled on a title yet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="88761adb910b43c9b1145797f6714b28" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]But I hope it will serve as a useful guide
to those who visit this planet.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="fe9978d4d80a49c9b4b3cafd9f21b8fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If that gigantic dog truly is genetically
similar to [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] then...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fe9978d4d80a49c9b4b3cafd9f21b8fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02FaceOnly"/]Perhaps [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/]'s ancestors left this
planet at some point.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="fe9978d4d80a49c9b4b3cafd9f21b8fc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]Which would indicate that this planet may
have once been home to intelligent life,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
advanced enough to travel into space!
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="3ea855bac6824a14a5dd8ec63a303f33" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]If not for [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/],[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I would've given up on
trying to get home long ago.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3ea855bac6824a14a5dd8ec63a303f33" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]Saying goodbye will be difficult. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]I'm sad
just thinking about it, [etc:Wait frame="8"/]but that's the way
it has to be.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="3ea855bac6824a14a5dd8ec63a303f33" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I have a home waiting for me,[etc:Wait frame="15"/] and so
does [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Lucky"/]Moss[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="7e850f32bf5b47d2bb864e4a4f94c05f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I was lucky the S.S. Dolphin happened to
be so close to the Rescue Command Post.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="7e850f32bf5b47d2bb864e4a4f94c05f" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="YareFaceOnly"/]Although things had mostly been resolved
by then,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] restarting a search for ship
parts would've been pretty inconvenient.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="1f5d51d7022a40639d54bac81d23e73c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I'm not sure why,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] but organisms that have
sprouted leaves cannot leave this planet.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
At least, that's what I've observed.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1f5d51d7022a40639d54bac81d23e73c" Scale="1"/]Moss already had a leaf on her tail when
we first met.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="1f5d51d7022a40639d54bac81d23e73c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]She may have been that way since birth,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
like the Pikmin.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="baf55c428ff942da9d5c0d5c862ba9e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I never imagined that a meteorite would
hit the ship...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="baf55c428ff942da9d5c0d5c862ba9e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]It's a miracle that I'm alive at all.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] I want to
thank you again for everything.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="baf55c428ff942da9d5c0d5c862ba9e9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]Seriously,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] thank you.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_06:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="0f39c8f7bd14420d99aa340aaa87e40e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]After my life support failed,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my memories
get very fuzzy.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0f39c8f7bd14420d99aa340aaa87e40e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]All I know is that when I awoke,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] my head
was brimming with all things Dandori and
nothing else.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="0f39c8f7bd14420d99aa340aaa87e40e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]I've had more than enough of these types
of experiences by now,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] believe me.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_07:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="ca8c3a46e7654f2db04801598bd3737a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I actually have another dog back on my
home planet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ca8c3a46e7654f2db04801598bd3737a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="TalkFaceOnly"/]His name is Bulbie,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and he's probably the
friendliest dog ever.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ca8c3a46e7654f2db04801598bd3737a" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I'd like to think he and [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/] would be
good friends.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_08:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="01b7d324cba64f9a87dcd7a4e0c9299c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]The truth about Louie is that he has a
good heart...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]deep down.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Beneath all those
clumsy and awkward parts.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="01b7d324cba64f9a87dcd7a4e0c9299c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I'm sure he had his own Louie-like reasons
for challenging you to a Dandori Battle.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="01b7d324cba64f9a87dcd7a4e0c9299c" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]Do you think you could let it go and
forgive him,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] for me?
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_09:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="8028bd803ecb42d0af77a3c70d4c2ddc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Think"/]I have a son and a daughter.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8028bd803ecb42d0af77a3c70d4c2ddc" Scale="1"/]This was my first break from work in a
long time,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] and look at how it turned out.[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
They must be worried sick about me.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="8028bd803ecb42d0af77a3c70d4c2ddc" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]I wish I could be with them at this
very minute.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Hint_04_10:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="23a1af50782f45ad862345341de404f0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]When I get back home,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I was thinking I
may write a book about this experience.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="23a1af50782f45ad862345341de404f0" Scale="1"/]I haven't settled on a title yet.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="23a1af50782f45ad862345341de404f0" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]But I hope it will serve as a useful guide
to those who visit this planet.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="6db0b3b3b39f42fe8c3571d77e6e0fd3" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]So there I was...
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_MenuSelect_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="0cb7a6e354a4465d84fc5b01ec7a2766" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Oh, right.[etc:Wait frame="8"/] It feels like it was yesterday...
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Continue_01:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="a67acc7a0493434c9881e5e6d8e77002" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I know you're busy. [etc:Wait frame="8"/]Do you want
to keep talking?
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Continue_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="ccbe7d91978a439595b28774f70404af" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]If you think I can be of any help,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] please
don't be shy.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Outro_B01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="8cc839f3324b40969cf458462a697518" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]I'm cheering for you two.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Outro_B02: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="a132d63798c1402c9a4e1fd6cd922149" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Until next time.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="281dd2e7c7254a7ba0bd36726937ed07" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Hello, [Npc:EmphasisStart NpcName="Happy"/]Oatchi[Npc:EmphasisEnd/].[etc:Wait frame="8"/] How are you today?
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_HappyTalk_02: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="7fa85b2715254df1b3c8a4cc411e9f27" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]You know,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] you're almost as cute as Bulbie.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Return_01: [Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="48cb242e9b4a49c8b595b5b0e73e9136" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]And that was it.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thanks for listening.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Return_02:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="b791d418171f4f199f5e5c390a915b3e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yes"/]I appreciate you taking the time to listen
to the entire harrowing tale.[etc:Wait frame="15"/] Thanks to
you,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I've been able to remember so much.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b791d418171f4f199f5e5c390a915b3e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]When I first became a leafling,[etc:Wait frame="8"/] I remember
seeing a very interesting-looking cave.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="b791d418171f4f199f5e5c390a915b3e" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Question"/]It must be around here somewhere...
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Return_03:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="ff1277b476614c6faa7c13ef60413438" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Yare"/]So that's how I ended up crash-landing
on this planet and becoming a leafling.[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="ff1277b476614c6faa7c13ef60413438" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="ThinkFaceOnly"/]I wonder if I could go back to that first
day and do it all over again...[etc:Wait frame="8"/]would I be
able to escape, knowing all I do now?
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Return_04:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="30cbc7e0b4334723bb7e3d3e6dc45c23" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk02"/]So that's the story of how I was pulled
back to this planet...[System:PageBreak ][UE:Meta key="30cbc7e0b4334723bb7e3d3e6dc45c23" Scale="1"/]And how I lost my life-support systems
and woke up as a leafling.
Olimar.Olimar_Area500_Talk_Return_05:
[Npc:Icon chara="Olimar"/][UE:Meta key="b83cad4a8e2043eba5bcef8a7e9d7aa9" Scale="1"/][Npc:Motion name="Talk"/]Whenever you want to hear my story,[etc:Wait frame="8"/]
come see me.
